# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.1.0/),
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

## [0.4.0] - 2026-01-23

### Added

- Add pt-BR transalation ([#50](https://github.com/ai-screams/scoop-uv/pull/50))

### Dependencies

- **deps:** Bump the rust-dependencies group with 3 updates ([#49](https://github.com/ai-screams/scoop-uv/pull/49))
[0.4.0]: https://github.com/ai-screams/scoop-uv/compare/0.3.2...0.4.0

<!-- generated by git-cliff -->

## [0.3.2] - 2026-01-12

### Added

- **test:** Add Deserialize and PartialEq derives for JSON roundtrip testing

### Changed

- **test:** Improve test isolation and fix doctests
- **test:** Move test-only helpers to test modules and clean dead code
[0.3.2]: https://github.com/ai-screams/scoop-uv/compare/0.3.1...0.3.2

<!-- generated by git-cliff -->

## [0.3.1] - 2026-01-12

### Added

- **i18n:** Apply runtime i18n to error messages with rust-i18n
- **i18n:** Apply Korean translations to CLI commands
- **i18n:** Add i18n infrastructure and lang command

### Changed

- Apply tone guide to user-facing messages

### Fixed

- **shell:** Add missing lang and migrate commands to completions

### Documentation

- Update README with v0.3.x features (migrate, lang, i18n)
- Add migrate command documentation to mdBook
- Add lang command documentation to mdBook
[0.3.1]: https://github.com/ai-screams/scoop-uv/compare/0.3.0...0.3.1

<!-- generated by git-cliff -->
